column1: '''Orofarnë''' was one of the [[rowans]] of [[Fangorn Forest]], much beloved by the [[Ents
column3: Bregalad]]. It was cut down by [[Orcs]] of [[Isengard]], arousing the anger of this impulsive Ent.<ref>{{TT

column2: Tolkien]] explained that ''orofarne'' means "mountain-dwelling" in High-elven ([[Quenya]]).<ref>{{L
column3: 168}}</ref> In another manuscript he glossed ''Orofarnë'' as "mountain ash", consisting of the [[Quenya]] elements ''[[Oron#Quenya

column1: Editors [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]] have made a connection between the [[Qenya]] word ''farne'' ("foliage"; a derivative of the [[Sundocarme
